ADDITIONAL LICENCES/ATTRIBUTIONS


Icons

All Icons used in this GUI are from cc mono icon set from http://www.iconfinder.com/iconsets/cc_mono_icon_set by Gentleface.com under Creative Commons (Attribution-Noncommercial 3.0 Unported), except for the 3D, & WINDOW icons which are attributable as follows:

"Icon made by Freepik from http://flaticon.com"


Stylesheet

The Qt stylesheet used in this GUI is a modified version of Qt Dark Orange from http://tech-artists.org/forum/showthread.php?2359-Release-Qt-dark-orange-stylesheet by LoneWolf.
